named-native-query.name: Insumo.buscarNativeQuery
named-native-query.query: select * from insumo where (cast(?1 as varchar) is null or idinsumo = to_number(cast(?1 as varchar), '999999999')) and (cast(?2 as varchar) is null or upper(dsinsumo) like upper('%' || cast(?2 as varchar) || '%')) order by dsinsumo
